00067 void RainbruRPG::Editor::SelectionManager::selectNewObject(Ogre::String s){
00068   if (checkSceneManager()){
00069     highlightObject(s);
00070   }
00071 }

00089 bool RainbruRPG::Editor::SelectionManager::checkSceneManager(){
00090   if (sceneManager==NULL || camera==NULL){
00091     LOGW("The scene manager or camera pointer is/are not valid");
00092     return false;
00093   }
00094   else{
00095     return true;
00096   }
00097 
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00106 void RainbruRPG::Editor::SelectionManager::highlightObject(Ogre::String name){
00107 
00108   if (name.compare("")==0){
00109     LOGW("SelectionManager::highlightObject: The object name is empty");
00110   }
00111   else{
00112     Ogre::Entity* entity=  sceneManager->getEntity(name);
00113 
00114     if (!entity){
00115       LOGW("Cannot get Entity by name");
00116     }
00117     else{
00118       
00119       // Delete the last selection highlight
00120       if ( isNodeHighLighted ){
00121         LOGI("Deleting last selection highlight");
00122         
00123         // Detach and destroy entity
00124         highLightNode->detachObject(highLightEntity);
00125         sceneManager->destroyEntity(highLightEntity);
00126         highLightEntity=NULL;
00127         
00128         // Destroy SceneNode
00129         sceneManager->destroySceneNode(highLightNode->getName());
00130         highLightNode=NULL;
00131         isNodeHighLighted=false;
00132       }
00133       
00134       // Ogre::AxisAlignedBox aab=ent->getBoundingBox();
00135       LOGI("Creating selection highlight");
00136       entity->setRenderQueueGroup(90);
00137       highLightEntity = entity->clone(entity->getName() + "Outline");
00138       highLightEntity->setRenderQueueGroup(91);
00139       highLightEntity->setMaterialName("Outline");
00140       
00141       highLightNode = entity->getParentSceneNode()
00142         ->createChildSceneNode(entity->getParentNode()->getName() + "Outline");
00143       
00144       highLightNode->setScale(Ogre::Vector3(1.05,1.05,1.05));
00145       highLightNode->attachObject(highLightEntity);
00146       isNodeHighLighted=true;
00147 
00148       createMoveHandle();
00149     }
00150   }
00151 }
00152 
00160 void RainbruRPG::Editor::SelectionManager::createMoveHandle(){
00161 
00162       if ( handleEntity && handleNode ){
00163         LOGI("Deleting last selection highlight");
00164         
00165         // Detach and destroy entity
00166         handleNode->detachObject(handleEntity);
00167         sceneManager->destroyEntity(handleEntity);
00168         handleEntity=NULL;
00169         
00170         // Destroy SceneNode
00171         sceneManager->destroySceneNode(handleNode->getName());
00172         handleNode=NULL;
00173       }
00174 
00175 
00176 
00177   // Creates a ray from the camera to the object
00178   // fixme getDirection must come from the object
00179   Ogre::Ray camObj= Ogre::Ray();
00180   camObj.setOrigin(camera->getPosition());
00181 
00182   Ogre::Quaternion camOrientation=camera->getOrientation();
00183 
00184   camObj.setDirection(camOrientation.zAxis());
00185 
00186   
00187   /*
00188   // Compute the position of the handle
00189   //  Ogre::Vector3 haPos= Ogre::Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
00190   Ogre::Vector3 haPos= camObj.getPoint(cameraToHandle);
00191 
00192   // Creates entity
00193   handleEntity = sceneManager
00194     ->createEntity( "moveHandle", "moveHandle.mesh" );
00195 
00196   handleEntity->setCastShadows( false );
00197   handleNode=sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()
00198     ->createChildSceneNode( haPos );
00199 
00200   handleEntity->setMaterialName("MoveHandle");
00201 
00202   //  sn->setOrientation(rw, rx, ry, rz);
00203   handleNode->attachObject( handleEntity );
00204   */
00205 
00206 }
